title: Confirmed tuberculosis cases that are drug-resistant versus drug-susceptible
subtitle: Some tuberculosis patients have bacteria that can die with the standard antibiotic treatment, [rifampicin](#dod:rifampicin), while others do not. This shows the number of [tuberculosis](#dod:tuberculosis) cases whose bacteria are confirmed to be susceptible to rifampicin, versus those have been confirmed to be [drug-resistant](#dod:drug-resistant-tuberculosis). Only a fraction of tuberculosis cases have their bacteria tested to confirm whether they are susceptible or resistant to drugs.
